front.title: IEEE General Principles for Rating Electric Apparatus for Short-Term, Intermittent, or Varying Duty
front.abstract: This standard establishes general principles for rating electric apparatus for short-time, intermittent, or varying duty. The four methods used for rating equipment are covered by the standard: the continuous rating method; the continuous plus short-time overload rating method or nominal rating method; the short-time rating method; and the periodic rating method.
